alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 10:20PM EST until January 02 at 11:15PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EST FOR EAST CENTRAL WAKULLA AND SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 1019 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Monticello to 24 miles south of St. Marks, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cody, Hells Half Acre, Lamont, Aucilla, Capps, Nash, Thomas City, Drifton, Fanlew, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs and Goose Pasture. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EST for Big Bend of Florida. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 300 AM EST for Big Bend of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
